Subject: Acts of Shameless Self-Promotion
Description: What's the best way to get your name forward?  Speakers include:Dave Klecha, Michael W. Lucas, Jackie Morgan, Steven Saus - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: SF/F Madlibs
Description: Enjoy science fiction, fantasy, and pop culture Mad-libs created by our panelists. Offer up some interesting nouns, adj, verbs and adverbs and be prepared to laugh your head off!  Speakers include:Andrea Johnson, Jackie Morgan, Jen Haeger, Alex Kourvo, Catherynne Valente - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: The Most Useful Tropes
Description: Cliches in fantasy and science fiction are a big no-no... except when they arent. What are the most-used tropes in SFF? Why are they so overused? Are they always bad? Are there ways they can be twisted to say new things about the genre?  Speakers include:Emmy Jackson, Jackie Morgan, Scott Favre, Mark Oshiro - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes
